sentences.en: Acceptable forms of payment are Visa , MasterCard, Cheque, or Money Order.
sentences.cn: 可接受的付款形式是维萨卡 、 万事达卡 、 支票 、 汇票.

sentences.en: Art Kranzley , of MasterCard , believes mobile - phone payments could cut down on fraud.
sentences.cn: 阿特卡兰斯勒 (ArtKranzley)认为,手机支付可以减少诈骗.

sentences.en: Fund your E - gold account directly with a credit card ( Visa, MasterCard ).
sentences.cn: 资助您的E金子帐户直接地与信用卡 ( 签证, 万事达卡 ).

sentences.en: Have you got a Visa card or a MasterCard?
sentences.cn: 你有维萨卡或者万事达卡 吗 ?

sentences.en: He handed me back my MasterCard.
sentences.cn: 他把我的信用卡还给了我.

sentences.en: I would like to apply for Lingnan University Graduate MasterCard Gold Card.
sentences.cn: 本人欲申请岭南大学毕业生万事达金卡.

sentences.en: I would like to apply for Lingnan University Student MasterCard.
sentences.cn: 本人欲申请岭南大学学生万事达普通卡.

sentences.en: MasterCard says its index reflects the interconnectedness of major global cities and tracks the ways in which business and leisure jet-setters spend their money.
sentences.cn: 万事达公司表示，其数据反映出世界主要大城市的互联性，并追踪了商务和休闲飞机乘客的消费方式。

sentences.en: Money is not everything. There is mastercard and visa.
sentences.cn: 钱不是万能的, 有时也需要信用卡.

sentences.en: Money is not everything. There's MasterCard & Visa.
sentences.cn: 钞票不是万能的, 有时还需要信用卡.

sentences.en: Passengers paying with MasterCard credit cards will a 10 per cent discount on their packages.
sentences.cn: 使用万事达信用卡(MasterCard)付账的乘客还能在特惠特价10%的折扣.

sentences.en: Passengers paying with MasterCard credit cards will receive a 10 per cent discount on their packages.
sentences.cn: 使用万事达信用卡(MasterCard)付账的乘客还能在特惠特价基础上享受10%的折扣.

sentences.en: The big payment card organisations, Visa and MasterCard, are taking an intense interest in this area.
sentences.cn: 大型信用卡机构威世和万事达正在对这一领域显示出浓厚的兴趣.

sentences.en: The chief protagonists in the row are Visa and Mastercard, the world's leading credit card brands.
sentences.cn: 这场纠纷的主角是世界两大信用卡品牌——维萨和万事达。

sentences.en: The SET protocol is developed by MasterCard and VISA as an Secure Electronic Transaction protocol.
sentences.cn: SET协议是由MasterCard和VISA制定的安全电子交易协议.

sentences.en: There are things money can't buy, for everything else there's MasterCard.
sentences.cn: 世上是有金钱买不到的东西, 但其它一切一切,请用万事达.
